languages.text:
The Overseer chooses one cell they see. The Cyber-Eagle descends into that cell, dealing thrice its weapon damage to all enemies around it and provoking AGI Save -{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294}. On a failure, they are {g|f:327db128df8b4ed5ad90fa64c3e413a9}Blinded{/g} for 1 round.
Available only if the Cyber-Eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer chooses one cell they see. The Cyber-Eagle descends into that cell, dealing thrice its weapon damage to all enemies around it and provoking AGI Save -{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294}. On a failure, they are {g|f:327db128df8b4ed5ad90fa64c3e413a9}Blinded{/g} for 1 round.
Available only if the Cyber-Eagle is {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Ascended{/g}.

languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает свободную клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Туда приземляется киберорел, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}. Он наносит утроенный урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Эти враги совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Overseer selects a cell in their line of sight. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}ascended{/g} effect. It deals its weapon damage increased by +100% to all adjacent enemies without provoking attacks of opportunity. Those enemies must pass an Agility resistance test with a −{uip|PetsPER|31e321c9332449c6a8531cb652b7290b} penalty or become blinded for 1 round.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattı{/g} içinde boş bir hücre seçer. Siber kartal o hücreye inerek {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselme{/g} etkisini kaybeder. Bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara silah hasarının üç katını verir. Bu esnada {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Bu düşmanlar −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşirler{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, görüş hattı içinde boş bir hücre seçer. Siber kartal o hücreye inerek {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselme{/g} etkisini kaybeder. Bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara silah hasarının üç katını verir. Bu esnada fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez. Bu düşmanlar −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} ceza puanına sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde körleşirler. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, görüş hattı içinde boş bir hücre seçer. Siber kartal o hücreye inerek {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselme{/g} etkisini kaybeder. Bitişikteki tüm düşmanlara silah hasarının üç katını verir. Bu esnada fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez. Bu düşmanlar −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde körleşirler. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} sélectionne une case inoccupée dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Le cyber-aigle atterrit sur cette case et perd l'effet {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Vol{/g}. Il inflige trois fois les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis adjacents, sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Les cibles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294}, sans quoi elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}aveuglées{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le surveillant sélectionne une case inoccupée dans sa ligne de mire. Le cyber-aigle atterrit sur cette case et perd l'effet {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Vol{/g}. Il inflige trois fois les dégâts de son arme à tous les ennemis adjacents, sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité. Les cibles doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294}, sans quoi elles sont aveuglées pendant 1 round.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} wählt ein unbesetztes Feld in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtfeld{/g}. Der Cyber-Adler landet in diesem Feld und verliert den Effekt {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Aufgestiegen{/g}. Er verursacht seinen dreifachen Waffenschaden bei allen angrenzenden Gegnern, ohne {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} zu provozieren. Diese Gegner müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} bestehen, sonst werden sie 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Aufseher wählt ein unbesetztes Feld in seinem Sichtfeld. Der Cyber-Adler landet in diesem Feld und verliert den Effekt {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Aufgestiegen{/g}. Er verursacht seinen dreifachen Waffenschaden bei allen angrenzenden Gegnern, ohne Gelegenheitsangriffe zu provozieren. Diese Gegner müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Abzug von -{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} bestehen, sonst werden sie 1 Runde lang geblendet.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視線{/g}の中の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルはそのセルに着陸し、{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}効果を失う。{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こすことなく、隣接するすべての敵に武器ダメージの3倍を与える。これらの敵は−{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 監督者は、視線の中の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルはそのセルに着陸し、{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}効果を失う。隣接するすべての敵に武器ダメージの3倍を与える。これらの敵は−{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294}のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間盲目になる。

監督者は、視線の中の空いているセルを選択する。サイバーイーグルはそのセルに着陸し、{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}効果を失う。隣接するすべての敵に武器ダメージの3倍を与える。これらの敵は−{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294}のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間盲目になる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Надзиратель{/g} выбирает свободную клетку в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Туда приземляется киберорел, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}. Он наносит утроенный урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Эти враги совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Надзиратель выбирает свободную клетку в зоне видимости. Туда приземляется киберорел, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}. Он наносит утроенный урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя атаки по возможности. Эти враги совершают проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} и в случае провала оказываются ослеплены на 1 раунд.

Надзиратель выбирает свободную клетку в зоне видимости. Туда приземляется киберорел, теряя эффект {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}. Он наносит утроенный урон от оружия всем врагам на соседних клетках, не провоцируя атаки по возможности. Эти враги совершают проверку Ловкости на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} и в случае провала оказываются ослеплены на 1 раунд.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}选择{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}范围内一个未被占据的格子，生化猎鹰会移动至目标格子，失去{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态，同时对所有邻近敌人造成三倍武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。所有受到攻击的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294}减值，否则就会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 监察官选择视线范围内一个未被占据的格子，生化猎鹰会移动至目标格子，失去{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态，同时对所有邻近敌人造成三倍武器伤害。生化猎鹰的移动不会触发借机攻击。所有受到攻击的敌人都需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294}减值，否则就会陷入致盲状态，持续一轮。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} selecciona una casilla libre en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. La ciberáguila se mueve a esa casilla, perdiendo el efecto {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g} e inflige el triple de su daño de arma a todos los enemigos adyacentes sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Los enemigos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} selects an unoccupied cell in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. The cyber-eagle lands at that cell, losing the {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g} effect. It deals three times its weapon damage to all adjacent enemies without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Those enemies must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El supervisor selecciona una casilla libre en su línea de visión. La ciberáguila se mueve a esa casilla, perdiendo el efecto {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g} e inflige el triple de su daño de arma a todos los enemigos adyacentes sin provocar ataques de oportunidad. Los enemigos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} o quedar cegados durante 1 asalto.

El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} selecciona una casilla desocupada en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. El águila cibernética aterriza en esa casilla, perdiendo el efecto de vuelo {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}{/g} . Inflige tres veces su daño de arma a todos los enemigos adyacentes sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Esos enemigos deben superar una prueba de Resistencia a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de -{uip|PetsPER|2abd1ef7c3bb4c77a2658637058fd294} o quedan {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
